Name: Waveborn Moonstone
AttributesDescription: A mineral that holds a glimmer of light. Can be used in the Moonlit Revelation event to decipher the Lunar Phases.
BgDescription: A natural blue mineral, known for its ability to absorb glimmers of light. When night falls, it gleams with a soft glow like moonlight rippling across the sea, hence the name Waveborn Moonstone. In Septimont, its association with the moon has made it a medium for reading the Lunar Phases.
ObtainedShowDescription: A mineral that holds a glimmer of light. Can be used in the Moonlit Revelation event to decipher the Lunar Phases.
